original_text: Then Pashur smote Jeremiah the prophet, and put him in the stocks that were in the high gate of Benjamin, which was by the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 이에 바스훌이 선지자 예레미야를 때리고 여호와의 성전에 있는 베냐민 문 위층에 목에 씌우는 나무 고랑으로 채워 두었더니

sentences.original_text: Then Pashur smote Jeremiah the prophet
and put him in the stocks
that were in the high gate of Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 그 형틀은 베냐민의 위대한 문에 있었고

sentences.original_text: which was by the house of the Lord
